scalar:array.comment: /** * Swift Mailer Connection Base Class * All connection handlers extend this abstract class * Please read the LICENSE file * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> * @package Swift_Connection * @license GNU Lesser General Public License */
/** * Swift Connection Base Class * @package Swift_Connection * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> */
/** * Any extensions the server might support * @var array */
/** * True if the connection is ESMTP. * @var boolean */
/** * Set an extension which the connection reports to support * @param string Extension name * @param array Attributes of the extension */
/** * Check if a given extension has been set as available * @param string The name of the extension * @return boolean */

/** * Get the list of attributes supported by the given extension * @param string The name of the connection * @return array The list of attributes * @throws Swift_ConnectionException If the extension cannot be found */

subNode:value.scalar:string: Unable to locate any attributes for the extension '
' since the extension cannot be found.

scalar:array.comment: /** * Returns TRUE if the connection needs a EHLO greeting. * @return boolean */
/** * Set TRUE if the connection needs a EHLO greeting. * @param boolean */

subNode:value.scalar:string: Forcing ESMTP mode. HELO is EHLO.

scalar:array.comment: /** * Swift Connection Base Class * @package Swift_Connection * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> */
